scripts.build-esm: npm run build -- --target es2015 --module es6 --outDir dist/esm
scripts.build-esnext: npm run build -- --target esnext --module esnext --outDir dist/esnext
scripts.build-all: rm -rf dist && (npm run build-commonjs & npm run build-esm & npm run build-esnext)
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && ./node_modules/.bin/typedoc --name async-flow --readme README.md --module commonjs --target ES5 --excludeExternals --out docs --theme default src/ && touch docs/.nojekyll
